Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Family | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Tuesdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: July 31, 2012

Every year, around 6000 children are excluded from British schools. High Close School in Berkshire, is run by Barnardo's and home to some of the most troubled children in the country. The series has access to staff, pupils and families as it tells the surprising and touching stories of two of the school's most challenging children called Courtney and Josh.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32305)
